headline: J.B. Hunt (JBHT): Assessing Valuation After New $1 Billion Buyback and Dividend Confirmation
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) just revealed its Board of Directors has approved a new $1 billion share repurchase plan and affirmed the regular quarterly dividend. These moves may catch investors’ attention. See our latest analysis for J.B. Hunt Transport Services. These shareholder-friendly moves come just as J.B. Hunt’s share price has surged around 25% in the past month, significantly outpacing its peers. While momentum is clearly building short-term, its total return over the past...
